1.0.name: wordpress/wp-best-quiz
1.0.description:
Create and manage pretty, dynamic quizzes using the WP Best Quiz plugin.

Managing and creating new quizzes is simple and intuitive.

  • Quiz questions can have single or multiple correct responses.
  • Results will include a percentage bar showing the number of users having opted a particular option.
  • Unlimited questions
  • Make changes to your quiz without having to publish them immediately.
  • Multiple quizzes on the same page

Created by [Subina Balakrishnan] - Web Developer at Itobuz Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Kolkata, India

The WP Best Quiz WordPress Plugin is now opensource.
